name: Fresh Apple Spice Cake
author: Juanita Dannenmueller
instructions: Cream margarine and sugars with electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time beating after each addition. Sift togeth- er the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and 2 teaspoons of cin- namon. Add sifted dry ingredients and milk in thirds alternately, beating until smooth after each addition. Fold in apples, spread batter in 9 x 13 x 2 inch pan. Sprinkle sugar, cinnamon and nuts on top. Bake at 300Â° for about 1 hour and 15 minutes.
